name: earnings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance.
Tool description: Access Yahoo Finance Realtime Stock Price |  Options | ESG | Trends | Statistics | Earnings | Balance Sheets | Analytics | Asset Profile and much more
API description: A company's earnings are its after-tax net income. This is the company's bottom line or its profits. Earnings are perhaps the single most important and most closely studied number in a company's financial statements.
This API **also** returns **historical earnings**

symb.description: The stock symbol representing the company whose earnings data is to be fetched.
